overview: Silent horse racing car racing romantic melodrama  about a Southern Colonel,  who  raises race horses, and whose daughter is a race car driver.  A man comes from the North to buy a race horse, but is robbed by a robber who proceeds to pose as him and kidnaps the girl.  The man rescues her and they end up getting married.
tagline: A Woman-Hater Falls for the Fairer Sex
title: Mistaken Identity
